Hi all,

I'm sure this topic must have been discussed before but I'd really appreciate
your comments, or more, your personal experience concerning your test package
structure. The two alternatives that I see are:

1)
src/com.mycompany.myapp.MyClass
src/test.mycompany.myapp.MyClassTest

2)
src/java/com.mycompany.myapp.MyClass
src/test/com.mycompany.myapp.MyClassTest

The first one separates the packages so that the deployment is easier however
there's need to import the tested classes within the test cases. The second one
removes the problem of importing however, for anybody external to the
application, the test cases suddenly make part of the final product.

I'd appreciate your comments/suggestions/success stories :-) on this.
Thanks,

 - Yagiz Erkan -
 http://yagiz.blogspot.com
 http://www.erkans.com
